LanguageData.Reunion_DownedRefugee.label: incapacitated refugee
LanguageData.Reunion_DownedRefugee.description: A stranded, incapacitated refugee begging for help.
LanguageData.Reunion_PrisonerRescue.label: prisoner camp
LanguageData.Reunion_PrisonerRescue.description: A prisoner being held by enemies. Rescue them and they will join you.
